context.rdfs:comment: Any offered Datagram core. For example: a message stream; a video stream; an audio stream; an action stream; or a stream of measurements.
context.rdfs:label: datagramCore

properties.rdfs:comment: The manufacturer of the Datagram core.
properties.rdfs:label: manufacturer

properties.rdfs:comment: A pointer to a Datagram container (or multiple Datagram containers) for which this Datagram core is a consumable.
properties.rdfs:label: isConsumableFor

properties.rdfs:comment: A pointer to another Datagram core (or multiple Datagram cores) for which this Datagram core is an accessory or spare part.
properties.rdfs:label: isAccessoryOrSparePartFor

properties.rdfs:comment: The model of the Datagram core. Use with the URL of a DatagramCoreModel or a textual representation of the model identifier. The URL of the DatagramCoreModel can be from an external source. It is recommended to additionally provide strong Datagram core identifiers via the gtin8/gtin13/gtin14 and mpn properties.
properties.rdfs:label: model

properties.rdfs:comment: The release date of a Datagram core or Datagram core model. This can be used to distinguish the exact variant of a Datagram core.
properties.rdfs:label: releaseDate
